forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 78, with temperatures falling to around 76 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then scattered showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and midnight. Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. Southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 76. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
